Title: Melissa Headstrong
Text:
Gaffer Gamgee is sure to know which hobbits have the best stories to tell of Bilbo's disappearance and his adventures and whereabouts since then.

Return to Gaffer after speaking to all of the hobbits.

Melissa Headstrong has agreed to share a story about Bilbo Baggins and his adventures.
CompleteText: Ah! You're collecting stories about Bilbo Baggins? I know a grand of one for ya, that fellow's been some places and seen some things, yes he most certainly has!
